member.name: T:API.Controllers.AcademiesController
member.summary: API controller for retrieving information about an academy from TRAMS

member.name: M:API.Controllers.AcademiesController.GetAcademyById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves information about an academy given its TRAMS Guid

member.name: T:API.Controllers.ProjectsController
member.summary: API controller for retrieving Academy Transfers projects from TRAMS

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ProjectsController.SearchProjects(System.String,System.Nullable{API.Models.Upstream.Enums.ProjectStatusEnum},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.UInt32},System.Nullable{System.UInt32})
member.summary: Search for Academy Transfer Projects.
member.param: The search term. The searched fields will be: Project Name, Outgoing Trust Name, Outgoing Trust Companies House Number, Academy Name
The project status: 1. In Progress 2. Completed
Determines if the results should be returned in ascending order. Default value is: true
The number of items to be returned per page. Must be larger than zero. Default value is: 10
The page number to be returned. Must be larger than zero. Default value is: 1

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetProjectById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets an Academy Transfers project by its ID

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetProjectAcademy(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a Project Academy entity by its id
member.param: The ID of the ProjectAcademy entity - this is the id of the custom entity, not the ID of the academy in TRAMS

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ProjectsController.InsertTrust(API.Models.Upstream.Request.PostProjectsRequestModel)
member.summary: API endpoint for creating a new Academy Transfers Project

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ProjectsController.UpdateProjectAcademy(System.Guid,System.Guid,API.Models.Upstream.Request.PutProjectAcademiesRequestModel)
member.summary: Endpoint for updating a Project Academy entity
member.param: THe Academy Transfers Project where the Project Academy entity is nested
The ID of the Project Academy entity. Note: this is the id of the join-table entity, not the id of the academy

member.name: M:API.HttpHelpers.ODataUrlBuilder`1.GetPropertyAnnotation(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the JsonProperty annotation of a certain property without any @metadata extensions Throws InvalidOperationException if the field doesn't have a JsonProperty annotation
member.param: The property - use nameof to ensure quasi strong type
member.returns: The name of the JsonProperty without any @metadata extensions applied

member.summary: Builds the Select and Expand OData query clauses from a given
